name: 山谷主
description:
This game will continue to be updated.

game + patch It will have more flavor！！！！
So be sure to join the group！！！！

【 Game Introduction 】
《山谷主》is a casual 3D pinball shooting game.
In the traditional Zuma play you can be shuttled around the map.
It incorporates elements like RPG skill strategy.

【 Game Features 】
1. The 3D scene, player is free to move anywhere on the map.
2. It incorporates RPG elements into traditional Zuma gameplay.
3. Rich level content, Up to 21 levels, each level has three different levels of difficulty.
4. Interesting gameplay for you to discover
